snippet: Benjamin Millepied’s L.A. Dance Project signed a three-year agreement with the French foundation.
abstract: LA Dance Project announces three-year partnership with Luma Foundation, which will provide continuing residency and performance space at its home in Arles, France
lead_paragraph: Benjamin Millepied’s L.A. Dance Project signed a three-year agreement with the French foundation.

headline.main: L.A. Dance Project Forms Partnership With Luma Foundation
headline.print_headline: L.A. Dance Project Forms Partnership With Luma
